biotools.summary: DNMFilter_Indel is a machine learning based tool designed to filter out false positive de novo indels obtained by any computational approaches from whole genome or exome sequencing data. It can be used as either a stand-alone tool to detect de novo indels or coupled with other commonly used de novo indel detection tool to improve specificity.
